text: 2.14: FG 17.5; Hi 10.33-34Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde Zudian guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi fara muuŋgi. Mbe Zisas Krais phorgi gumgi gu mbigi ma. Nden kɨvntogi simtɨgar nde ndɨɨi tɨvara, mbe Zudian kav guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, Zudaiŋ simtɨgar mbe nɨɨŋgi.
